name: toast
description: A toast tool written in JavaScript and CSS without any other dependencies.

scripts.deploy-master: git co master && node build.js && git add --all && git ci -m 'deploy'
scripts.deploy-pages: git co gh-pages && git rebase master && git push origin gh-pages -f && git co master
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-master && npm run deploy-pages

author: wangzilong03
